testcase.name: start
testcase.system-out:  Test0 Scenario is as follows Unlock phone, clear recent apps, clear internal memory Call Image() and Capture Rear camera 25 images for default resolution in uSD card and Verify the data capture Call Video() and record Rear camera video of first 2 resloutions for 2 minutes of duration in uSD Card and verify the same Call Format() and format uSD card with data and verify the same  Setting up the appium desired capabilities Clearing Recent Apps Pass: Test0 Pass for clearing Recent apps Launch File Manager Application and clear internal memory Select Internal storage Swipe up and select uSD card Select Internal storage Pass: Clearing phone internal memory is successfull  Calling Image() for rear Image capture in uSD Card and Verify the Captured images if Location permisson Pop Exists Select Cancel Option change to SD card element not found : org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: An element could not be located on the page using the given search parameters. testcase.name: rearVideoRec
